title: Mbappe to Real Madrid : We talk about it in locker room - Tchouameni
body_text:
Sport
Mbappe to Real Madrid: We talk about it in locker room – Tchouameni
Real Madrid midfielder Aurelien Tchouameni has insisted that he and his teammates talk about the possibility of Kylian Mbappe joining the Los Blancos in the near future.
Tchouameni said this while responding to a question on Mbappe’s future after Real Madrid defeated RB Leipzig 1-0 in the Champions League on Tuesday.
Mbappe’s current deal with PSG will expire at the end of the season.
The France international is expected to join Real Madrid.
However, when his national team colleague, Tchouameni, was asked about the possible transfer, the midfielder said (via Get Football News Spain):
“Mbappe to Real Madrid? He has not told me, and even if he did, I would not tell you (laughs).
“Yes, we talk about it in the locker room because it is an important subject.
“Hopefully we know more in the next weeks.”
